description: A city located in the northern part of the ancient Krokian plain, near modern Akitsi/Mikrothivai.

properties.description: The theatre of Thebes, according to ArchDelt 47.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Theatre

properties.description: According to ArchDelt 47 (1992), there is an upper circuit wall of Thebes.
properties.title: Imagery Location: Upper circuit wall

properties.description: According to ArchDelt 47 (1992), there is a possible acropolis at Thebes.

properties.description: The lower circuit wall according to the plan in ArchDelt 47 (1992, 224).
properties.title: Imagery Location: Main circuit wall
